Posts.EditableText:
I don't know if this the right place to post this, but I added a blackjack minigame to my text adventure.
It seems to be running fine, the thing is I'm not the most experienced when it comes to coding/scripting and feel like the scripts for it are way too long. I was wondering if I could have someone look at it, see if I overlooked anything and if it's possible to condense or clean it up.
If anyone does help with that, I'll make sure to credit them in the final product.

Posts.EditableText:
Sure... several people here would like doing that...
But, something I've noticed...
Everyone has their own coding style, some short and sweet, some long and drawn out...
Most of the time that does not mater...
The main concern is that the game works...
